abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Fourth Social
            Investment Fund Project are: (a) to increase access among
            the poor to small-scale social and economic infrastructure
            in accordance with local development priorities; (b) to
            develop social assistance programs for disadvantaged groups;
            and (c) to contribute to the prospects for sustainability of
            such investments. The project components include: (a)
            subproject financing for social and economic infrastructure
            subprojects and special programs such as social assistance
            and programs for indigenous communities; (b) a pilot program
            for local institutional strengthening; (c) a pilot program
            to strengthen community and rural water systems; and (d)
            project management.
